title: Understanding VLOOKUP
text: The VLOOKUP function is used to search for a value in the first column of a table and return a value in the same row from a specified column.

title: Direction of Lookup
text: Consider the direction in which the VLOOKUP function searches for data. Is it vertical or horizontal?

hintAnswer: looking up a table when the direction is vertical, or down the worksheet
title: Choosing the Correct Direction
text: Does the VLOOKUP function look up a table when the direction is vertical, or down the worksheet?
choices: looking up a table direction for a field of data that is horizontal, or across the worksheet
looking up a table when the direction is vertical, or down the worksheet
